message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Accept and we can move on!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going all the way to 50/50 yet.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a better deal. Meet me in the middle?
I'm still not willing to give up too much. You'll have to do better than that.
I'm getting desperate, Bob. I need a better deal to make this worth my while.
I'm not getting any younger, Alice. I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal, but don't think you're getting off that easy.
I'm not getting any younger either, Bob. Let's meet in the middle and end this before it's too late.
